hero.title: Togo Style Sofa
hero.description: Mobelaris Togo Style Sofa Set is the perfect reproduction of the mid-century vintage classic by French seating designer, Michel Ducaroy. Want the warmth of comfort and nostalgia wrapped into a cushion of luxury? This is the set for you.

products.title: Available online in 7 colors made completely from high-quality polyurethane foam.

productInspiration.title: Sink Into Luxurious Vintage Comfort
productInspiration.content: The Togo Style Sofa is an iconic mid-century design that remains a coveted piece in modern times. It was designed by iconic French designer Michel Ducaroy in 1973 and was originally produced by a company in France.

faqs.title: TOGO STYLE SOFA - FAQs
faqs.description: Find answers for common questions about Togo Style Sofa

questions.question: Is the fabric on the Togo Style Sofa washable?
questions.answer: The upholstery is spot clean only.

questions.question: How do you care for the Togo Style Sofa?
questions.answer: You can do daily dusting and light vacuuming on the Togo Style Sofas to maintain them.

questions.question: Does the Togo Style Sofa have matte or satin sheen?
questions.answer: Our Togo Style Sofas have a matte sheen.

questions.question: What is the Togo Style Sofa made from?
questions.answer: The frame is made of multiple density UK fire foam. It is gloved with man-made wadding for extra comfort and upholstered in Creamy, Boucle, Alcantara, or Velvet.

questions.question: Do you sell the Togo Style Sofa in sets?
questions.answer: We sell them separately so you can mix and match your Togo Style set to fit your space. Click [here](https://www.mobelaris.com/en/search/?q=togo) to browse and pick Togo Sofas.

questions.question: Does it come with a warranty?
questions.answer: Yes, our Togo Style Sofas come with a 5-year warranty.
